['DescriptionLa Rosa by Dubai Holdings is a plush residential project located at Villanova in Dubai. Dubai Holdings is a reputed realty company in Dubai. It is just like as mall town within a city. A lovely place to be at. 
What are the key Details of the project?
You can opt for either 3 bedroom or 4 bedroom villas as a wide variety is available to choose from. The villas are well-equipped with world-class modern specifications to make you fall head over heels in love with these alluring houses. 
What are the amenities available here?
The range of amenities will surprise you as you will get almost everything modern and chic.The gated community provides security always. Lovely parks with perfect jogging tracks. A shopping centre to suffice your daily household needs. A huge play area for children, help them grow better, let them play. A community swimming pool where you can enjoy your leisure time. Well-equipped gymnasium to keep you in great shape. Beautifully landscaped gardens with paved compounds and car parking areas. 
Advantage of the location .
Location wise this place earns an extra brownie point because it is strategically located in near the junction of Emirates Road and Al Ain road. It takes 7 minutes to reach the Global village from this place. Within 15 minutes you will reach Dubai airport, just 18 minutes to Business Bay. It takes just 15 minutes to Down Town Dubai. This place is also close to well-known schools, colleges, hospitals,recreational areas, etc. 
USPs of the project:·
Community swimming pool.
Gymnasium.
Parks landscaped gardens and paved compounds.
Car parking areas.
Play area for children .
Townhouse Size – 1947 Sq Ft.
Townhouse Price – 1414900 AED.
For more details,feel free to call us the earliest.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxhabitat is pleased to offer this Reserve villa within the renowned estate of Al Barari. The property boasts 6 bedrooms, all en-suite bathrooms and has never been occupied. It also hosts 3 reception rooms, study, parking for 3 vehicles and comes complete with its own private pool.
The flooring throughout the property is marble, imported from Italy. This property was originally a shell and core option but has been upgraded by the current owner. 
Al Barari is a green oasis within the desert city of Dubai and is like no other community. Award-winning natural landscaping forms 60 percent of the project. The Reserve comprises 28 freehold plots designed to accommodate high-end bespoke freehold villas with 4 or more bedrooms built across 4 leaves (7 villas per leaf) to service the ever-growing global property market trend of home customization. 
The estate also features a state-of-the-art health club, Body Language; an award-winning restaurant, The Farm and a destination spa, Heart & Soul. A total of six themed gardens with over 16.4 kilometers of naturally landscaped lakes, freshwater streams, cascades, and waterways make Al Barari the lowest density development in the UAE.
Please call today to speak to our in house specialist to see like-minded properties.']
